Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 170th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Pedro Lazpita (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2015, off William Kinch (NY)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Kansas City, driving in 5 runs on 5/7/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2016, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Brooklyn to St. Louis (B) on 6/5/2016 (Going to BRO: LF Thomas Shaw, P Grady Horvath. Going to SLB: SS Bill Coakley)...
Injured on 6/5/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/16/2016 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/2/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/11/2018 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Boston on 8/14/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 9/6/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
